name: My Friend Teddy (Marty)
description:
My Friend Teddy is a puzzle game where you are lost in some sort of dark room and you have to find a way out. Luckily, you have your friend Teddy who emitts light that makes it easier to see. Don't leave him behind for too long or you might get lost.

Controls:

Movement: A and D / Left Arrow and Right Arrow

Jump: W / Up Arrow / Spacebar

Throw/Pick Up: E (hold S / Down Arrow to throw down)

This is a submission to Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2.
